message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in something that will bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800,000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm interested in the product, but $800,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'd be willing to pay $700,000. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $700,000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $850,000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you, and I believe it's a good compromise. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $850,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go to $750,000. This is a fair price considering the value you've already acknowledged the product has. Let's see if we can find common ground.

I understand that $750,000 is still a bit lower than my target price, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $800,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value the product will bring to you. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.
